name: Meltdown Evasion
description:
Do you like unreasonably hard (mainly on android), 2D, sci-fi themed games about dodging lasers, that you can enjoy forever? If yes, then you're in luck ! Meltdown Evasion has it all ! 😎😎

Are you broke, living in your mum's basement and want something for FREE ? Meltdown Evasion is here for you!  (that doesn't mean I wouldn't accept a small donation🙄)

Meltdown Evasion has:
  • static & rotating lasers !
  • randomly generated corridors !
  • portals !
  • Collectible coins & skin shop !
  • And more that I don't want to spoil !

(Please note that the rooms that make up the map are designed by hand, so the gameplay will unfortunately become repetitive after a while  +  for some random reason it runs super slow on android but on my shitty pc it gets around 300 fps)
